verses.text: \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* determined \w to|strong="H5921"\w* build \w a|strong="H5921"\w* house \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* palace \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* numbered \w out|strong="H7971"\w* seventy thousand \w men|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* bear burdens, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* eighty thousand \w to|strong="H0413"\w* hew stones \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* mountains, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* three thousand six hundred \w to|strong="H0413"\w* oversee \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* sent \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Hiram \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Tyre, saying: \w As|strong="H3068"\w* thou didst \w with|strong="H1004"\w* David \w my|strong="H3068"\w* father, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* didst send \w him|strong="H5921"\w* cedars, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H4150"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* dwelt:

\w So|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H0589"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H0430"\w* dedicate \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* burn incense \w before|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* perfume \w with|strong="H1004"\w* aromatical spices, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* continual setting forth \w of|strong="H1004"\w* bread, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* holocausts, morning \w and|strong="H0430"\w* evening, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sabbaths, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* new moons, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* solemnities \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* commanded \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Israel.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* desire \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* great: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* great \w above|strong="H6440"\w* all gods.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w then|strong="H6258"\w* \w can|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* able \w to|strong="H7971"\w* build \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* worthy house? \w if|strong="H0834"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* heavens \w of|strong="H0376"\w* heavens cannot contain \w him|strong="H7971"\w*: \w who|strong="H0834"\w* am \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* able \w to|strong="H7971"\w* build \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* house? \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H6258"\w* end only, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* incense \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* burnt \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w skillful|strong="H3045"\w* man, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* knoweth \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* work \w in|strong="H5650"\w* gold, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* silver, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* brass, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* iron, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* purple, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* scarlet \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* blue, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath skill \w in|strong="H5650"\w* engraving, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* artificers, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* Judea \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Jerusalem, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w David|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* father \w provided|strong="H3045"\w*.

Send \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* cedars, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* fir \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* pine \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w from|strong="H6086"\w* Libanus: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* know \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thy servants \w are|strong="H0834"\w* skillful \w in|strong="H1004"\w* cutting \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* Libanus, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* servants \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* thy servants,

\w To|strong="H5414"\w* \w provide|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* abundance. \w For|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* house \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* desire \w to|strong="H5414"\w* build, \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* exceeding great, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* glorious.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thy servants \w the|strong="H0853"\w* workmen \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* cut \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* trees, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* food twenty thousand cores \w of|strong="H4428"\w* wheat, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* many cores \w of|strong="H4428"\w* barley, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* wine, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* oil.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Hiram \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Tyre \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* letter \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Solomon, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath loved \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* added, saying: Blessed \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* Lord \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Israel, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H7971"\w* earth, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* hath given \w to|strong="H7971"\w* king \w David|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w son|strong="H2450"\w*, endued \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* prudence, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* build \w a|strong="H7971"\w* house \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* palace \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w himself|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* Hiram, \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w most|strong="H4480"\w* \w skillful|strong="H2803"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*,

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* son \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* woman \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H5650"\w* Dan, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* father \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* Tyrian, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* knoweth \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* work \w in|strong="H5650"\w* gold, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* silver, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* brass, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* iron, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* marble, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* timber, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* purple \w also|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* violet, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* silk \w and|strong="H7971"\w* scarlet: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* knoweth \w to|strong="H0559"\w* grave all sort \w of|strong="H5650"\w* graving, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* devise ingeniously all \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H0113"\w* need \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* work \w with|strong="H7971"\w* thy artificers, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* artificers \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w David|strong="H7971"\w* thy father.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* wheat \w therefore|strong="H0859"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* barley \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wine, \w which|strong="H6086"\w* thou, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord, hast promised, \w send|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thy servants.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* cut down \w as|strong="H0834"\w* many trees \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Libanus, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt want, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* convey \w them|strong="H0310"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* floats \w by|strong="H3478"\w* sea \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Joppe: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* thy part \w to|strong="H3478"\w* bring \w them|strong="H0310"\w* thence \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Jerusalem.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* Solomon \w numbered|strong="H0505"\w* \w all|strong="H0505"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* proselytes \w in|strong="H0505"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*, \w after|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* numbering \w which|strong="H2022"\w* David \w his|strong="H5647"\w* father \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* found \w a|strong="H2672"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* fifty-three \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And he set seventy thousand of them to carry burdens on their shoulders, and eighty thousand to hew stones in the mountains: and three thousand and six hundred to be overseers of the work of the people.
